website_summaries.verdict: Product moisturizes the dog's skin and adds fullness to the fur for a healthy coat.
pros: This protein-based conditioner is formulated to repair a dog's dry, damaged coat
Fur will feel thicker and have more texture with regular use
Delivers improved moisture to the skin, which leads to less shedding
cons: Has a strong scent that may be too powerful for some dogs and owners

customer_reviews.title: Smells Divine
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with any of Isle of Dogs products. They always leave the dog smelling amazing and the conditioners are just right, do the job and wash out easily - perfect for dry coats and spaniel ears.
customer_reviews.author: MTHellfire

customer_reviews.title: Super Conditioning for Dogs with Sensitive Skin & Smells Great as It Fades...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent conditioner for dogs with sensitive skin. We have an apricot poodle/yorkie mix & other shampoo/conditioner combos leave her with itchy skin. So far, this has been TOPS--no residue, no itchiness & it seems to have soothed her skin. I recommend pairing it with the matching Isle of Dogs shampoo; they seem to work really well together, though in my opinion, you only need one container of conditioner for every two bottles of shampoo. Works great and smells good, especially as the scent gently fades over the course of a week: A+!
customer_reviews.author: OK

customer_reviews.title: Works on all coat types!
customer_reviews.text: It's pricey for a professional dog groomer, even when diluted. However, I am addicted! This is a magical conditioner. I bought it for show dogs and my two pet dogs. After one day of use, I ordered a second batch. It is satisfying while bathing and there is no greasy residue. In the 6 years working in the pet grooming industry, I have never experienced a conditioner that has left so much gloss, gentle on skin/coat, repair, de shedding, volume, and - for the professionals out there - scissor/clipper ease. Summary: I wish there was a gallon priced economically. It is a miracle product reviewed by a dog groomer/skin/coat nerd.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Obray

customer_reviews.title: Maltese Perfection
customer_reviews.text: This is a VERY PURPLE conditioner. It will help with white dogs a lot but you’ll want to follow up with a good conditioner after this during bath time or a good leave in. If you have a long hair white dog then you know what purple conditioner is like. Both the shampoo (which is perfection) and the conditioner smell like perfection and it’s not heavily scented but my dog smells freshly groomed until I bath her again. It’s amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Jenocidal

customer_reviews.title: Best products for the price point I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: If they had 10 stars, I’d give this product a 10. Luxurious lather and divine smell. ++ on coat whitening. I’ve been using professional enzyme whitening products on my Standard Poodle for years. I got better whitening results with one use from Isle of Dogs. This S&C are both amazing. This is my “go to” from now on. The Lush Brush spray is better than the premium product I have been using a pay a small fortune for! I’ll never use anything else on my diva from this point on!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Holcomb-Blair

customer_reviews.title: Isle Dog Shampoo & conditioner
customer_reviews.text: This conditioner is awesome and I have been through shampoos and conditioners and this one is by far the best. I have one Shih Tzu and two Maltese one hair is thicker than the other and the Maltese with the thick hair felt brittle after using this shampoo and conditioner the hair was soft and have shine and honestly the hair was much whiter. and its been two weeks since I use this shampoo and the hair is less tangled and more manageable. Try this product trust me you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Alesa Gumbs -Cicilia

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay - Was on Sale
customer_reviews.text: This works okay, I'm glad I got it on sale, I wouldn't pay full price for it. I've used conditioners for dogs that actually made the coat softer and shiny, this product doesn't do that. The scent doesn't last longer than a day and again, I've used products that have a loner lasting scent. It's not the worst product I've ever used but it's definitely not the best, either.
customer_reviews.author: Sirena H

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.text: Took into my groomer to use on my three Maltese and she just raved about this conditioner and had to know were I got it (Amazon of course!!). I've since used it myself on bath day and agree with my groomer - this is the best conditioner I've tried yet. It has a light pleasant fragrance that lasts for several days after the bath - and more importantly it does a fabulous job of smoothing out tangles after shampooing and continues to keep their coats easy to comb for days after. I diluted it with water to lightly spray on "trouble spots" before their daily comb outs. Highly recommend especially for long haired dogs!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mb

customer_reviews.title: I used it on my cat and they loved it
customer_reviews.text: I know this is meant for dogs but I went ahead and used it on my cat before a photoshoot and it worked perfectly. They loved the scent, it kept them calm and no fussing during bath time. I know the seller will say ask your vet but in my opinion I think it’s safe for cats that are not sensitive or have allergies. At least it was great for mine.
customer_reviews.author: Aqua Heavener

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Have a poodle so this was much needed! As far as the scent goes, I just have a SUPER sensitive smeller so it's a bit strong for me, but still nice. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Golden Retriever
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this stuff! My Golden Retriever comes out so nicely. His fur is so healthy and soft! The scent isn't my favorite, but it does keep him smelling nice for a long time- especially considering how much he loves being a dirt-loving rambunctious boy.
customer_reviews.author: onyxignite

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff
customer_reviews.text: I adore this stuff! I bought the shampoo and conditioner for my show dog. It smells great but isn’t overpowering and fluffs the coat really nice. My only problem is with the conditioner. It’s super thick so it takes FOREVER to rinse all the way out of the coat and if it isn’t out 120%, it leaves a horrible residue. Other than that, it’s pretty great!
customer_reviews.author: Sallie

customer_reviews.title: My groomer uses it. It’s THE BEST I’VE EVER USED
customer_reviews.text: My groomer uses this! It is AMAZING! Sooooo soft! Use with the conditioner!! The best shampoo and conditioner I’ve EVER used and I’ve had Maltese and Cavalier dogs for 17 years!
customer_reviews.author: TeeForTwo

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously strong smell!
customer_reviews.text: Does not condition that well and the smell is very over powering. Almost like Cool Water Cologne but like you dumped a gallon in your dogs bathtub. Will not purchase from this brand again. I had to stop in the middle of one application and rinse it off and re wash my Pom to get the smell off of her.
customer_reviews.author: Jessyca B.

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again for our pure maltese
customer_reviews.text: I've been using human conditioner on our little pure maltese. This is way more supiorior . It rinsed out faster and easier . Lovely fragrance silky coate. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Carol A.F.

customer_reviews.title: I love it for my show dogs☺️
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my poodles looking good! It has a nice subtle smell, it's not over powering....I use only isle of dogs on my show dogs.... Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Smells so pretty! Leaves my German Shepherd's hair soft and silky. Dragon approves! Please mark this review as HELPFUL if it helped you make a decision. Thank you :)
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel and Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and the subtle scent (once the dog is dried) is great. Very calming scent. It leaves my the coats of my dogs very soft .
customer_reviews.author: Heather S.

customer_reviews.title: Love this and all isle of dogs products
customer_reviews.text: Same as the other comments I already made: goes on easy ringed out nicely and knot free on his current ‘sweetheart ‘ cut with the German ggoattee!
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: 5 lhasa in drop double coat- this product leaves coat extremely dry - makes skin itchy frizzes coat with chunks undercoat loss after bathing& for days after - still doing it It has done more damage than good
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Chaviano

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Tangle free
customer_reviews.text: I have an Australian Shepard who has a fine undercoat and gives me a problem with brushing his behind, I bought this hoping it would help with the tangling in his rear and I have to say yes it did. I washed him several weeks ago and his behind is still soft and silky with no tangles, It is one of the best shampoos and conditioners I have tried!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Barbose

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: This product smells great while bathing your dog. The scent does not last. It does leave my dogs coat nice and soft.
customer_reviews.author: FranBill

customer_reviews.text: Got for my cavalier king Charles Spaniels, my black and tan is silky smooth already but my blenheim was kind of fluffy this smoothed her out great
customer_reviews.author: brittany phillips

customer_reviews.title: Smells Nice
customer_reviews.text: We like to give our dog a bath a few times inbetween when she gets groomed and this is the best shampoo & conditioner we have come across. The scent is very lovely and lasts, keeping her smelling fresh longer!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine S

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty good but not as fragrant as other reviews would lead you to believe. I couldn't smell it on my dog after her bath. It made her coat somewhat softer. Its pretty good but not great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Works just as described. Keeps my pets’ furso soft and smelling great! I use it both on my Pom’s thick, fluffy fur and my Yorkie’s silky hair. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Gamelovinmom

customer_reviews.title: Soft Dog alert!!
customer_reviews.text: Not only does this smell good without being overpowering, my dogs' fur is sooooo soft. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Schmelzer

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff...the best Ive used...don't let the color scare you. Your pooch will be sitting and WHITE!!❤️
customer_reviews.author: Laura Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Very good !!
customer_reviews.text: It smells great! I received a busted bottle but Amazon quickly replaced it with a new one. I tried to use whatever remained in the bottle and it smelled so good and it left the small patch I showered my dog with, really soft and fluffy. I really love this product. It is very thick, could be diluted.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Aromatic
customer_reviews.text: This is very aromatic. Your dog will smell very much like a perfume shop for a good day or two after using it. It is a bit too much for me, but see why people would like it. It is pretty easy to rinse and does leave the coat soft and silky.
customer_reviews.author: Lori C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice stuff for our pups and smells good too!
customer_reviews.text: We really like this conditioner and the corresponding shampoo for our Pomeranians. We have tried EVERYTHING for the double coats which can be coarse. Their coats are soft. Shiny and fluffy. Our groomer loves it as well. She says when using IOD her hands never dry out. Our pups smell great and combing and brushing them is so much easier too.
customer_reviews.author: Joss

customer_reviews.title: As far as shedding it has gotten better but I can't say for sure if this is ...
customer_reviews.text: LOOOOOVVVEE this stuff. My Dog was a rescue dog. Her hair was so brittle and dry, shedding so much. Used once and OhMY, what a big difference in the way her coat felt. soft and shiny. As far as shedding it has gotten better but I can't say for sure if this is why because I feel it is the combine treatment from having a good home and eating healthier. It has to be helping along with teh other stuff we are doing, I was not expecting one wash would make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amara

customer_reviews.title: Smells like heaven
customer_reviews.text: Love this one. It smells like heaven. The conditioner doesn’t do as great as the Vanilla scented one.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Smell
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprise on how good this smell.Item is small for the price.
customer_reviews.author: PRINCESS

customer_reviews.title: Smell great but!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent but didn't make his coat soft and fly away free.
customer_reviews.author: Suzette Stone

customer_reviews.title: The best.
customer_reviews.text: This smells amazing I got shampoo and conditioner , they make my chows hair smell and feel so nice. I love it. I’d probably use this on my hair if I could.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Smells great. Very fresh and not too strong
customer_reviews.text: Smells great. Very fresh and not too strong. Works well too, but we were mostly looking for something with a nice scent that lasts longer than a day. This fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth L.

customer_reviews.title: Leaves pups hair super soft!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for dog with coarse hair - really makes if silky!
customer_reviews.author: G. Bledsoe

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I use this on both my short hair dogs. They smell wonderful and it makes their coats soft and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: pam zygmunt

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Didn't want to order it before I smelled it, but after reading various reviews decided to take a chance. Quite a nice product and wish I could find it locally. Since I cannot, I will simply order again when I need it.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Another great IOD product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shampoo and conditioner to use for bating my non-show dogs. I want all my dogs to look good, all the time, showing, or not. Anyway, I love the results. Great products, and very close to the more expensive IOD product lines. The fragrance is there, but I did not have a problem with it. It softens and fades quickly. So, if you like IOD products, I am pretty sure you will be pleased with this as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper of Classics and Quality

customer_reviews.title: Great smelling. Not for detangling.
customer_reviews.text: Great smelling conditioner. The scent stays on the dog for several days. It’s not a detangler though.
customer_reviews.author: Adele

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best grooming products there is!smells great and makes my dog look amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dallmann

customer_reviews.title: nice smell, soft and conditioning
customer_reviews.text: I got this conditioner for my morkie who has issues with her hair getting matted and it really has seemed to help with that issue!!
customer_reviews.author: kenneth krzyzewski

customer_reviews.title: Silky smooth!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. I'm very satisfied with this. My cavalier is soft, shiny and smells great!!!! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Karen Stroud

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: I love this conditioner! I use Isle of Dogs Everyday Violet & Sea Mist Lush Coating Conditioner on my miniature poodle and it not only leaves her hair smelling wonderful, but also makes it so soft and fluffy. I shampoo with Isle of Dogs Everyday Violet & Sea Mist Lush Coating Shampoo and follow up her bath with Isle of Dogs Lush Coating Brush Spray. Highly recommend Isle of Dogs products
customer_reviews.author: Amalfi Decor

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo & conditioner!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this shampoo & conditioner for my golden retriever since we got her and have always loved it! Leaves her coat very soft and well-conditioned.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Nauseating smell.
customer_reviews.text: What a shame that they imbedded this great product with the long lasting stink of cheap men’s cologne. I love what it does for my poodle’s coats, but I couldn’t stand to have them near me for days after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Poodle Mom

customer_reviews.title: This conditioner is a great buy as an add on item
customer_reviews.text: My dog (60+ pound brindle Sheppard mutt) gets itchy skin so whenever we give him a bath we put conditioner on him and that helps him so much. This conditioner is a great buy as an add on item. My dog wasn't itchy, smelled great, and was so soft and luxurious.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney S

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!!! Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! I got the shampoo and conditioner. My dog (teacup poodle) is still so soft, days later and usually she gets ratty after a day (Florida humidity). She was outside with us all weekend and still smells good! A miracle! And still so soft! Love this stuff!! Got brush spray too, so nice for a quick fluff. I am going to buy for my mother in law and my aunt for their poodles.
customer_reviews.author: ChelsieP

customer_reviews.title: smells great
customer_reviews.text: Definitely love this product and I love the way you smell
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Santana

customer_reviews.title: Ok shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Its a good shampoo. Its not all it says it is but it worked out ok.
customer_reviews.author: Karen J. Oviatt

customer_reviews.title: Best for Goldendoodles
customer_reviews.text: Bought this conditioner for our F1B Goldendoodles. Would give it 6 stars if I could. Have used other products for years and this is by far the best on the market- and reasonably priced, and doesn’t smell fake. Their sensitive skins did great! Will not buy another product now.
customer_reviews.author: ZSM

customer_reviews.title: Fresh scent and so moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Simply amazing. I bought it again. Works for humans too, only shampoo that didn’t make my hair worse. Don’t knock it till you’ve tried it. I have 3 small dogs. They smell amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Nini Sterling

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: Leaves my pups hair lush and shiny. The scent is amazing! You’d never know you’re using pet shampoo/conditioner. It smells great!
customer_reviews.author: LILA

customer_reviews.title: Loved it for my Bichon Frise
customer_reviews.text: Loved it for my Bichon Frise. His hair is soft and fluffy and it helped keep him from getting tangled so easy to brush and comb after his bath. Love the fragrance!
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Amazing smell, not as soft as expected
customer_reviews.text: The scent is amazing! Didn't mind bathing my golden retriever & doxy mix with this product. Spread well and felt soft during the wash. Only after pups were dry did I notice some sticky residue. Their coats were not as soft as other dog conditioners but I'm wondering if the extra rinsing will do the trick next time. Would be 5 stars without the residue.
customer_reviews.author: Sarika

customer_reviews.title: Great smelling product
customer_reviews.text: Great grooming product with a nice scent that isn’t over powering. Definitely will recommend and repurchase too.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo and conditioner!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo and conditioner! My dogs fur has never been softer or smelled better since I’ve started using it. I have a golden retriever, and I love Isle of Dogs. Won’t ever use a different brand on him.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: scents ok..likevghe jasmine/vanilla better.
customer_reviews.text: I would rather have the jasmine/vanilla scent but u only carry that in the shampoo now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Conditioner!
customer_reviews.text: This conditioner smells sooooo good! It makes my corgis smelly (in a good way) and makes their coats super soft. I get compliments all the time on how soft their fur is and part of it is because of this conditioner (and a healthy diet). I will be purchasing more from this company in the future.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome conditioner!
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and worked very well on my Great Pyrenees!
customer_reviews.author: mark gionfriddo

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It smells wonderful and it makes my dogs coats so soft. I find my dogs scratch less, so it doesn't dry out there skin.
customer_reviews.author: M. McEndree

customer_reviews.title: Good, but like Vanilla Jasmine better
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product, but I decided I liked the IOD Silky Vanilla Jasmine better. This did not leave them as soft and silky feeling, and not as tangle free.
customer_reviews.author: nana58

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice scent. Works well on my long fine haired dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Sindy E.

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed, I definitely prefer the jasmine conditioner that it is out of stock.
customer_reviews.author: PrissyH

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this for my poodle requests. The let parents seem to love it too. They always comment on the smell and feel of the coat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: Really didn't work as well as I hoped and the great smell didn't last on my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Terri S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for fluff-ball dogs
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Keeps my Shih-Tzu's coat fluffy and soft and smells great. Definitely a more masculine woody smell, though, so keep that in mind. The scent lasts a few days so it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Clavast

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Conditioner
customer_reviews.text: I looked at several amazon dog shampoos & Conditioners and choose this brand after looking at their website and seemed high class. I am very happy with how this makes my dog's black coat look, feel, smell. I will definably buy the shampoo & conditioner again.
customer_reviews.author: AMAZON_BUYER

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Such a gorgeous smell and makes our Cavalier King Charles Spaniel's coat so soft! Used in conjunction with the Lush Coating Shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Lee

customer_reviews.title: Amazing smell!
customer_reviews.text: I love how this stuff smells. Totally takes away that horrible dirty dog smell that you often can still smell after bathing. He's a bichon and this makes his "hair" so fluffy and soft. Smells like a really good men's cologne and it lasts for quite a while. I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: coffeejunkie

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Works nicely on my long haired chihuahua. His hair is a bit course. Just make sure you leave it on for a few minutes before rinsing, otherwise it has no effect. He is always so soft and cuddly after he's been conditioned with this product!
customer_reviews.author: MistreatedTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Both DOA, one broken sensor and the other doesn't light
customer_reviews.text: I liked the price but as the saying goes, you get what you paid for. The shipping box was fine but could have used more packaging material inside the product box. Product box is extremely poor. The other, well, as you can see it didn't work when connected.
customer_reviews.author: ppvald

customer_reviews.title: Good product, smells great
customer_reviews.text: Smells wonderful and doesn't irritate my dogs skin or eyes, I just wish it conditioned a bit more. Don't get me wrong, it does make his fur softer but I have used other products that rinsed out easier and left his fur softer and easier to comb - hence the 4 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Art the Science Guy

customer_reviews.title: Probably won't buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Smells fine, not a natural scent that's for sure. Also, it stained my cast iron tub purple so make sure you wash the tub immediately after bathing your dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda C

customer_reviews.title: The best dog shampoo I’ve used
customer_reviews.text: Loved the shampoo. It lathered very nicely and easily rinsed out. I washed his face and it did not bother his eyes. It smells wonderful and his coat was beautiful. We have a darling little mini goldendoodle. We will used this again!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs smell good longer, and it leaves their coat clean shiny and soft!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: no wet dog smell here!
customer_reviews.text: I love Isle of Dogs products! They smell so good, and leave your furry friend soft and smelling great.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: My dogs still smell good two weeks after a bath with this stuff
customer_reviews.text: My dogs still smell good two weeks after a bath with this stuff. They hate baths so it's always a major to do at my house when I have to bathe them so anything that keeps them smelling good longer than a week is worth any price but this stuff is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Mixuone

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this conditioner! It makes my dog smell like flowers and freshness for a long time! It keeps him smelling good between baths and detangles his curly hair. Simply love the scent and quality of this item!!
customer_reviews.author: Jess8780

customer_reviews.title: Results in soft doggy but smell is too strong
customer_reviews.text: I love how this makes my dog (golden retriever) so soft, but the smell is too strong for me. She walks around the house afterwards smelling like a human with too much perfume. Smell is nice, but too strong. I dilute with water and that helps a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Ciarra

customer_reviews.title: Totally recommend this👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Her fur is extremely soft because of this conditioner and it also has an amazing fragrance.. Feels like she has been to a spa ☺️.
customer_reviews.author: U Sehgal

customer_reviews.title: Nice conditioner
customer_reviews.text: It smells great and really softens and thickens my Goldens coat. I can easily brush him and he smells wonderful. I highly recommend diluting 1:10 with water to make it last.
customer_reviews.author: lclass003

customer_reviews.title: Yes! Love the scent
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent. It's great for my little shitzu baby boy.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: this smells amazing! And even a few days after use
customer_reviews.text: Oh dear lord, this smells amazing! And even a few days after use, my dogs still smell absolutely amazing! I'm in shock, honestly, that I haven't tried this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Great conditioner
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! My dogs look and smell great. Leaves a beautiful shiny coat.
customer_reviews.author: PROUDMOM

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent of this product! My lab's fur is so soft and smells great. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Superbizmom

customer_reviews.title: Smells Incredible 😋
customer_reviews.text: it smells SO good and it makes our Goldendoodle has great soft curls Finish with conditioner I also love helps brushing and less mats .🙏
customer_reviews.author: Lana R. Bade

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: This works amazing on my wheaten terrier. She smells great after and is super soft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Isle of Dogs Lush Coat Violet and Sea Mist Conditioner
customer_reviews.text: Very nice conditioner... made the dogs coats smooth and removed a lot of shedding undercoat.. left a beautiful lush but light fragrance.. non irritating.. I will buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Laura R. Libner

customer_reviews.title: Big fluff
customer_reviews.text: Best dog conditioner leaves my little man feeling soft and smelling fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Love this item and my poodle smells so good afterwards!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry L

customer_reviews.title: Great For Yorkies
customer_reviews.text: I use it on my yorkies and it works great on them.

customer_reviews.text: this shampoo is great it only takes a little bit to do the job. Rich lather and a wonderful scent that lasted at least two weeks. It is easy to use and really cleans well. Will buy again when needed.

product_meta.title: Everyday Isle of Dogs Lush Coating Violet + Sea Mist Dog Conditioner 16.9 Ounce
product_meta.description: After bathing with Lush Coating Shampoo, the next step to a fluffier, more plush-feeling coat is this rejuvenating, protein-based conditioner. Evening Primrose and Jojoba oils combine with Keratin Amino Acids to help strengthen dry hair and lessen shedding. The results are a richer, fuller coat that is hydrated and fresh.
feature_bullets: FOR DRY & DAMAGED COATS: This rejuvenating, protein-based conditioner helps prevent damage while giving fullness & a textured feel to the coat. It features our ocean-fresh violet & sea mist fragrance
REDUCES SHEDDING: Designed to help moisturize & condition without flattening or softening like a regular conditioner, this conditioner helps release dead coat, cutting down on post-bath shedding.

CLEAN PUPS: A clean, shiny & fresh coat is a good indicator of a healthy, well-loved pup & a necessity for extended cuddle time. Our shampoos, conditioners & brush sprays are perfectly balanced & help remove odor.
HELPING YOUR DOG SHINE: We understand the power of wellness to help dogs shine from the inside out. We offer nutritionally superior food, treats, & supplements alongside premium grooming products.
INNER WELLNESS & OUTER BEAUTY: We promote health & beauty through nutrition and wellness because we care as much as you do about what you put in, & on, your dog's body.
